name: Spritta
description:
Spritta

An open ended take on the classic infinite runner, take things at your own pace while using the parkour running system to make your way through the atmospheric and stylized levels.

Speed things up to increase your score!

This is the first game my friends and I have ‘finished’ and though it’s a little rough around the edges we think it’s pretty fun to play and waste time with.

The amazing OST was made by my good (and infinitely patient) friend Quinn. Whom you should definitely check out over at his SoundCloud

or

(https://soundcloud.com/quinn-jacobus)
